title: Small bets, fast loops
description: Launch in weeks, not months. Every product is a hypothesis â€” the market is the only judge that matters.

title: Revenue is signal
description: Downloads and stars are vanity. Someone paying you money is the only proof that you've solved a real problem.

title: Kill fast, double down slow
description: Most projects should die young. When one gets traction, that's when patience and craft kick in.

title: Stay default alive
description: No fundraising. No burn rate. Build from revenue, keep costs near zero, and own every decision.
